doc.title: Subway (Chikatetsu)
doc.plot: "Subway" (Chikatetsu) reveals the highs and lows of Japanese society captured through the eyes of a young female. The purity and the corruption, the loyalty and the deceit, as well as society's influence on the conformity of individuals all act as the catalysts that push many to live a life plagued by hypocrisy, compromising everything they know to be moral. Will this diverse group of people survive everyday life in Tokyo? Will they achieve their dreams or will they descend into their life connected by the Subway? Will society claim yet another victim or will hope and determination prevail?
